bibl.title: Papyrus Documentation in the Period of Diocletian and Constantine.
bibl.note: This article is the third and last in a series of attempts to set forth the chronological distribution of documents for which objective absolute dates are available during the period from Diocletian to Heraclius. Period covered: 284-337.
bibl.seg: Bagnall Roger S. and K.A. Worp, Papyrus Documentation in the Period of Diocletian and Constantine.

This article is the third and last in a series of attempts to set forth the chronological distribution of documents for which objective absolute dates are available during the period from Diocletian to Heraclius. Period covered: 284-337.
